_metadata.description: Generate and download PDF health reports with current metrics and time range
userFlow: System generates PDF with current health data
Report includes metrics, charts, and time period

trigger: User clicks download report button (Download icon) in health dashboard actions

dataFlow.request: Button click → downloadReportMutation → POST /api/health-data/report → PDF generation → Binary response
dataFlow.response: PDF blob → URL.createObjectURL → Automatic download → Success notification

errorPaths.network: Error toast with 'Failed to generate report' message
errorPaths.business: Empty data graceful handling with informative report

data_inclusion.metrics: All visible dashboard metrics for selected time range
data_inclusion.metadata: Report generation date, time period, data source

user_experience.loading: Button shows loading state during generation
user_experience.naming: Descriptive filename with time range and date
user_experience.format: Standard PDF format compatible with all devices

current_status.backend: API endpoint planned but not yet implemented
current_status.pdf_service: PDF generation service to be integrated
current_status.error_handling: Complete error handling with user feedback
